LanguageData.COAA_ButcherSmallCreatureFlesh.label: butcher small creature
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherSmallCreatureFlesh.descripti: Butcher a small creature to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherAnimalFlesh.label: butcher animal
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherAnimalFlesh.description: Butcher an animal to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.\n\nSelecting "Do until" will only count animal meat.
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherInsectFlesh.label: butcher insect
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherInsectFlesh.description: Butcher an insect to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.\n\nSelecting "Do until" will only count insect meat.
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherHumanFlesh.label: butcher human
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherHumanFlesh.description: Butcher a human to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.\n\nSelecting "Do until" will only count human meat.
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherAnimalInsectFlesh.label: butcher animal or insect
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherAnimalInsectFlesh.descriptio: Butcher an animal or insect to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.\n\nSelecting "Do until" will only count animal and insect meat.
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherAnimalHumanFlesh.label: butcher animal or human
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherAnimalHumanFlesh.description: Butcher an animal or human to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.\n\nSelecting "Do until" will only count animal and human meat.
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherInsectHumanFlesh.label: butcher insect or human
LanguageData.COAA_ButcherInsectHumanFlesh.description: Butcher an insect or human to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.\n\nSelecting "Do until" will only count insect and human meat.
